flexibleContent.heading: The dream team.
flexibleContent.content: Technology is an ever-changing world. We’ve built a team of industry-leading professionals; who are adept at cutting-edge skillsets. Our clients have trusted our team of over 100+ professionals.

teamMembers.title: Nisarg Mehta
teamMembers.content:
Nisarg Mehta, CEO & Chairman of Techtic Solutions, is the vision of the company. With a vast experience of more than 10 years in various verticals of IT industry, he is highly qualified & deserving leader. Nisarg has worked for some giants like Dialogic, Formerly known as Intel & has studied Master of Science, Telecommunication Engineering from University of Texas, Dallas & Bachelor of Engineering, Electronics and Communication from Gujarat University.

Nisarg is active in operations in his daily routine as he is one of the key decision makers in terms of technological advancements of the company. He is a friendly leader & brings hardworking, motivating and passionate personality.

Nisarg is always keen to give something back to the community and supports non-profit causes. He loves to stay with family and friends in the free time and believes in balanced life.

teamMembers.title: Jitendra Mehta
teamMembers.content:
Jitendra Mehta, Chief Finance Officer plays a key role in formulating the new heights for Techtic Solutions having over 35 years of experience in banking & other major sectors.Mr. Mehta is plays major role in performance measures, budgeting process, tax strategies & business planning.

Mr. Mehta is a very soothing personality who manages administration, risk mitigation as well as financial matters for Techtic Solutions making it look easy. With his leadership Techtic Solutions has always been one of the best payers for IT industry with maximum employee satisfaction ratio.

Mr. Mehta is always the person to seek advise from and accessible to everyone. His lively attitude is what makes him different from a stereotype CFO.

teamMembers.title: Abhishek Singh Chauhan
teamMembers.content:
Abhishek, currently working as a Delivery Manager who happens to be the first employee of Techtic Solutions. Abhishek has a post graduation diploma in design & multimedia and one of the most innovative UI/UX experts with over 12 years of experience. He remains updated with the changing trends of designs for web, mobile & graphic. He was heading the design team and his aptitude towards running design sprints and enthusiasm of solving business problems of customers brought him to become a project manager.

Abhishek not only shares the vision of Techtic Solutions but also has been a backbone of the company. Since the inception of the company, he has been helping management in decision-making, policy formations as well as performance improvements. He is inspired by the design legends and has trained plenty of amazing designers working for Techtic Solutions.

teamMembers.title: Jyoti Bharti
teamMembers.content:
Jyoti is a senior HR executive at Techtic. She has been the people’s person for over four years and is helping us manage human resources at Techtic.

Given her professional choice, her strengths include strong interpersonal, analytical, and negotiation skills that shine in her work.

Jyoti is a Yoga enthusiast and sometimes plays around with Aerobics.

teamMembers.title: Chintan Bhatt
teamMembers.content:
A smart professional, active and confident with a consistent track record of achievement. Possess techno commercial understanding of multiple technologies and well versed in product, services and solution selling. Experienced in acquiring new business, responding to request for proposals, and having excellent Account Management Skills with a strong understanding of sales & business fundamentals

Having in-depth involvement in all levels of pre-sales and marketing and eager to bring more expertise to increase sales and ensure overall efficiency in the capacity of a Business development person in a company which rewards hard work and creativity.

teamMembers.title: Tarun Solanki
teamMembers.content:
Tarun is a business development manager at Techtic. He has been in the business for over nineteen years and is in the limelight among clients.

During his tenure with Techtic, Tarun bagged WWF as a client, improved his attitude toward approaching prospects, became a better team player, and got good with the number game.

He loves to watch Bollywood movies and spend quality time with family when he is not working or bagging new clients for Techtic. He also likes to read books.

teamMembers.title: Satish Mudaliar
teamMembers.content:
Satish is working as a business development manager at Techtic. It’s been more than eleven years since he’s been in touch with customers in the IT industry.

During his tenure with Techtic, Satish has added many badges to his profile, including Big Commerce Certification, hitting targets, and ensuring maximum customer satisfaction.

Satish is a wanderer and adventurous. He loves to travel, swim, go to movies, and play sports (Cricket & Football, to be specific) when he is not selling.

teamMembers.title: Shraddha Gohel
teamMembers.content:
Shraddha is a business development manager at Techtic. She has more than five years of experience in sales and growing at an exponential pace.

During her employment at Techtic, Shraddha realized her hidden power to achieve client collaboration targets. She also managed to become an eCommerce expert and helped many brands to go digital the best way.

She loves to be a part of CSR activities when she is not working. She also likes to read books and smash ping-pong balls when she gets free time from making the world a better place to live.

teamMembers.title: Komal Rana
teamMembers.content:
Komal is a Customer Success Manager and possesses more than twelve years of experience in the sales field.
During the ten years at Techtic, she has faced many ups and downs. With fierce determination and hard work, along with support from colleagues and upper management, she has managed to keep her career graph flourishing. She has been promoted to customer success manager.

Komal loves to travel, shop, dance, cook, and sit idle sometimes.

teamMembers.title: Mukesh Purohit
teamMembers.content:
Mukesh is the project manager at Techtic. He has been in IT for more than thirteen years and has played several roles, including developer, team lead, and project manager.

He started at Techtic as a developer and was promoted to Sr. developer to team lead and to PM.

He loves to play cricket and watch movies of different genres in his leisure time.

teamMembers.title: Vaibhavi Gandhi
teamMembers.content:
As a digital marketing manager, Vaibhavi is responsible for every aspect of marketing at Techtic. She has more than ten years of experience in helping companies gain brand presence and grow sales.

She has a clear perspective on digital marketing and emphasizes performance marketing, email marketing, and social media marketing, where social media is her first love. She has worked on various parts of social media marketing, starting from building a B2B community, crafting and creating a community of email enthusiasts on Twitter to working with a start-up where she helped to build a very unique brand voice in their domain and become one of the loved brands in that space.

Vaibhavi loves to explore the globe with her camera lenses. She is also an artist, with Origami being one of her interests.

teamMembers.title: Naitik Mulasiya
teamMembers.content:
Naitik is a tech leader of the open-source development department at Techtic. He has an experience of more than seven years in the IT industry.

He joined Techtic as a Jr. web developer and worked hard to be promoted to Sr. developer. Given his commitment and intelligence, coupled with IT and people skills, he is now the tech lead.

Naitik likes to cook and watch football, movies, and web series in his leisure time. He is also an explorer and loves to travel.

teamMembers.title: Mihir Dudhia
teamMembers.content:
Mihir is a tech leader in the web development department at Techtic. He has been in the web development field for more than seven years and has helped many brands go digital.

Mihir is usually a part of client calls and has frequently been appreciated by the clients for achieving milestones on time. He’s currently leading and nurturing a team of web developers at Techtic.

In his leisure time, Mihir loves to listen to music and bring his camera lenses to light.

teamMembers.title: Anil Sharma
teamMembers.content:
Anil is a tech leader in the web development department at Techtic. He has been working for more than seven years and has helped companies realize project success.

During his time at Techtic, Anil has gained the ability to work on multiple platforms and improved his confidence in programming and web concepts. He is a great team leader that focuses on supporting and motivating his team.

Anil boasts an analytical brain thanks to his interest in Chess. He also likes to smash badminton shuttles and travel in his leisure time.

teamMembers.title: Atri Madhu
teamMembers.content:
Atri is a tech leader in the web development department at Techtic. He has been working in the web development field for more than six years and has possessed knowledge of several industries.

He started at Techtic as a Sr. developer, and with her exceptional people and problem-solving skills, he got promoted to tech lead.

Atri is an outdoor person and loves to play Cricket and Volleyball. he also likes listing to rhythmic instruments and exploring the mountains.

teamMembers.title: Mansi Shah
teamMembers.content:
Mansi is a QA lead at Techtic. She has an experience of more than six years in making software products flawless.

She joined Techtic as a fresher, and with implacable determination and testing skills, she got promoted, and now she is working as the QA lead.

Mansi loves to watch moves and read books in her leisure time.
